catalyst: The experiment uses HGONTP catalysts, specifically HGONTP-200, and pristine g-C3N4 as photocatalysts. In the HER experiments, 3 wt% of Pt was photodeposited on the photocatalyst.
co_catalyst: The photocatalytic conversion efficiency of CO2 to CO reaches as high as 3.3 mol g-1 h-1 without cocatalysts and sacrificial agents.
light source: 300 W Xe lamp with an AM1.5 filter
